channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped mattress on Ainsty St, 27th October
item.description:
A double mattress has now been fly tipped next to the sofa which was already there (reported Oct 2025). Please can someone come and tidy it as soon as possible?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albion Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders blocking parking spaces, 27th October
item.description:
This has been going on consistently with the same builders. This space has been blocked since last week with a variety of items. If we had a car without a permit we would be fined, not sure why they can take up spaces without being fined.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Nutbrook Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped black sacks, 27th October
item.description:
Another popular place for people to fly tip and dump their rubbish. Several black sacks and household items. Blocking pavement access.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hylton Street, Plumstead, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 27th October

item.title: Over growing trees, 27th October
